items.title: Infosys Wins Seven Prestigious Oracle Excellence Awards
items.description: Oracle today awarded Infosys (NYSE: INFY), a global leader in consulting, technology and next-generation services, seven of its 2016 Oracle Excellence Awards.
items.content: Oracle today awarded Infosys (NYSE: INFY), a global leader in consulting, technology and next-generation services, seven of its 2016 Oracle Excellence Awards.

items.title: Infosys Expands Engineering Services Footprint to Support Ansaldo Energia
items.description: Infosys (NYSE: INFY), a global leader in consulting, technology and next-generation services, today announced an agreement to provide engineering services to Ansaldo Energia, a producer of thermoelectric power plants. To support Ansaldo Energia, Infosys will expand its global service delivery network into Eastern Europe and Russia’s established heavy engineering sector by creating two development centers – in Karlovac in Croatia and Moscow in Russia.
items.content: Infosys (NYSE: INFY), a global leader in consulting, technology and next-generation services, today announced an agreement to provide engineering services to Ansaldo Energia, a producer of thermoelectric power plants. To support Ansaldo Energia, Infosys will expand its global service delivery network into Eastern Europe and Russia’s established heavy engineering sector by creating two development centers – in Karlovac in Croatia and Moscow in Russia.

items.title: Infosys Finacle and Huawei Partner to Create New Financial Cloud Solution
items.description: Infosys Finacle, part of EdgeVerve Systems, a wholly owned subsidiary of Infosys (NYSE: INFY), and Huawei, a leading global ICT solutions provider, today announced the global availability of the industry leading Finacle Universal Banking Solution Suite on Huawei’s FusionCloud based cloud platform.
items.content: Infosys Finacle, part of EdgeVerve Systems, a wholly owned subsidiary of Infosys (NYSE: INFY), and Huawei, a leading global ICT solutions provider, today announced the global availability of the industry leading Finacle Universal Banking Solution Suite on Huawei’s FusionCloud based cloud platform.

items.title: Infosys Finacle Named a Leader among Customer-Centric Global Banking Solutions
items.description: Infosys Finacle, part of EdgeVerve Systems, a product subsidiary of Infosys (NYSE: INFY), today announced that it has been named a leader by Forrester Research, Inc. in ‘The Forrester Wave™: Customer-Centric Global Banking Platforms, Q3 2016’ report.
items.content: Infosys Finacle, part of EdgeVerve Systems, a product subsidiary of Infosys (NYSE: INFY), today announced that it has been named a leader by Forrester Research, Inc. in ‘The Forrester Wave™: Customer-Centric Global Banking Platforms, Q3 2016’ report.

items.title: Infosys Statement on Announcement Made by Royal Bank of Scotland on Williams & Glyn
items.description: The Royal Bank of Scotland announced last week that it will no longer pursue its plan to separate and list a new UK standalone bank, Williams & Glyn (W&G), and instead will pursue other options for the divestment of this business.
items.content: The Royal Bank of Scotland announced last week that it will no longer pursue its plan to separate and list a new UK standalone bank, Williams & Glyn (W&G), and instead will pursue other options for the divestment of this business.

items.description: Every generation today is trapped between the past way of delivering, experiencing vs. catching up with rapid change lest they become obsolete.

items.description: In this blog, a set of testing techniques are proposed that enable cost-effective non-functional requirements validation for web-based applications.

items.title: Why peer-to-peer insurance is coming your way
items.description: According to experts, the system of peer-to-peer insurance works because crowd funding ensures that people form like-minded digital communities based on trust and a common theme.
items.content: According to experts, the system of peer-to-peer insurance works because crowd funding ensures that people form like-minded digital communities based on trust and a common theme.

items.title: How to close that elusive digital loop
items.description: The blog discusses that true measure of an enterprise becoming digital is in closing the loop. It is when the knowledge gained out of both real-time and historical data covering the enterprise, the customer, and the product, is harnessed to make insightful decisions.
items.content: The blog discusses that true measure of an enterprise becoming digital is in closing the loop. It is when the knowledge gained out of both real-time and historical data covering the enterprise, the customer, and the product, is harnessed to make insightful decisions.

items.title: Mobile performance testing - is it possible?
items.description: While performance testing mobile applications, factors such as interruptions, spike load test, different types of mobile networks, phones, latency, bandwidth, signal strength, browsers, and operating system must be considered.

items.title: Message in a bottle
items.description: The success of progressive companies will depend on how innovative ideas serve consumer needs. While the genie is out of the bottle, the messages that emerge from the shifts in consumer goods serve as guiding lights for the industry.
items.content: The success of progressive companies will depend on how innovative ideas serve consumer needs. While the genie is out of the bottle, the messages that emerge from the shifts in consumer goods serve as guiding lights for the industry.

items.title: Exit for Britain, uncertainty for banks
items.description: Due to these changes in the rules and regulations in both EU and the UK owing to ‘Brexit,’  "RegTech" will be one of the most crucial areas of focus for banks. They would need to come up with a comprehensive strategy to ward off the challenges coming from this revised regulatory overload.
items.content: Due to these changes in the rules and regulations in both EU and the UK owing to ‘Brexit,’  "RegTech" will be one of the most crucial areas of focus for banks. They would need to come up with a comprehensive strategy to ward off the challenges coming from this revised regulatory overload.

items.title: Infosys Public Services and District of Columbia Partner to Successfully Modernize Eligibility and Enrollment System for Social Programs
items.description: Infosys Public Services Inc., a US-based subsidiary of global consulting, technology and next-generation services company Infosys (NYSE: INFY), and the District of Columbia Department of Human Services, today announced the achievement of a milestone in their joint project, the District of Columbia Access System (DCAS).
items.content: Infosys Public Services Inc., a US-based subsidiary of global consulting, technology and next-generation services company Infosys (NYSE: INFY), and the District of Columbia Department of Human Services, today announced the achievement of a milestone in their joint project, the District of Columbia Access System (DCAS).

items.title: Spotlight on regional issues at World Economic Forum on ASEAN
items.description: The blogger speaks about his experience of representing Infosys at the World Economic Forum (WEF) on ASEAN in Kuala Lumpur. Read on to know about the key topics that were discussed at the forum.

items.title: Paytm Selects Infosys Finacle to Power its Payments Bank Business
items.description: Infosys Finacle, part of EdgeVerve Systems, a wholly owned subsidiary of Infosys (NYSE: INFY) and Paytm, India’s largest mobile payments and commerce platform, today announced that the Finacle Core Banking solution has been selected to power Paytm’s new payments bank business.
items.content: Infosys Finacle, part of EdgeVerve Systems, a wholly owned subsidiary of Infosys (NYSE: INFY) and Paytm, India’s largest mobile payments and commerce platform, today announced that the Finacle Core Banking solution has been selected to power Paytm’s new payments bank business.

items.title: Golden rules for large migration
items.description: The blog discusses how changes in schedule are a rampant issue in large programs and addresses the need for rigorous risk management.
items.content: The blog discusses how changes in schedule are a rampant issue in large programs and addresses the need for rigorous risk management.
